cli_content:
Policy ID  From Zone  To Zone    Source Address     Destination Address Action  Status
1          trust      untrust    192.168.1.0/24     any                 allow   enabled
2          trust      untrust    any                10.0.0.0/24         deny    disabled
3          dmz        untrust    172.16.0.0/16      any                 allow   enabled
4          trust      dmz        any                any                 deny    enabled
textfsm_template:
Value POLICY_ID (\d+)
Value FROM_ZONE (\S+)
Value TO_ZONE (\S+)
Value SRC_ADDR (\S+)
Value DST_ADDR (\S+)
Value ACTION (\S+)
Value STATUS (\S+)

Start
  ^Policy ID\s+From Zone\s+To Zone\s+Source Address\s+Destination Address\s+Action\s+Status\s*$$
  ^${POLICY_ID}\s+${FROM_ZONE}\s+${TO_ZONE}\s+${SRC_ADDR}\s+${DST_ADDR}\s+${ACTION}\s+${STATUS}\s*$$ -> Record
